title: Otto van Rees
text:
Otto van Rees (4 January 1823 – 10 March 1892) was a Dutch <a href="liberalism">liberal</a> <a href="politician">politician</a> and the Colonial Governor of the <a href="Dutch%20East%20Indies">Dutch East Indies</a>.
Van Rees was Minister of Colonial Affairs of the Netherlands in 1879. He was <a href="president%20of%20the%20House%20of%20Representatives%20of%20the%20Netherlands">president of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands</a> from 22 September 1881 to 19 January 1884 and <a href="Governor-General%20of%20the%20Dutch%20East%20Indies">Governor-General of the Dutch East Indies</a> between 1884 and 1888.
Otto van Rees had the nickname ‘King Otto’ during the time he was the Colonial Governor in the Dutch East Indies.
